headline: Sunroom Take 2
description: A reflective artistic work embodying the 'Pale Sun After Storm' phase, capturing the softened light and calm that follows emotional upheaval. The piece holds warmth tempered by the memory of rain, framed within a structured interior view.

fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: Subjective timestamp reflecting when the post was emotionally or conceptually formed

resonantThread: The quiet resilience found in rebuilding light after the storm has passed.
whyItMatters: Documents the emergence of calm and clarity as part of an ongoing record of emotional phases, offering a model for reflective endurance.

motifMap.meaning: structure and boundaries maintained after change
warmth and renewal returning with caution
residual calm and cooling influence after emotional rain

articleExcerpt: My light is not fierce, but it is steady. I walk on ground still damp with what has been.
sourceFragments: Draws from the defined phase 'Pale Sun After Storm' in the ongoing emotional cartography project.

associatedMedia.description: Illustration of a divided window lit by a soft burst of sunlight, representing tempered hope after a storm.
